document.discussion_title: Broiler/Fryer: Daily National Broiler Market at a Glance
document.topic_text: AJ_PY010 Atlanta, GA. Thurs. Aug. 11, Broiler/Fryer: Daily National Broiler Market at-a-Glance Whole broiler/fryer prices are trending steady, to some instances firm in the West. Retail and food service demand is light to moderate. Offerings of all sizes are light to moderate for current trade needs. Floor stocks are generally balanced. Market activity is slow to moderate. In the parts structure, offerings of boneless skinless breasts are in good balance with premiums noted; Wings, tenders and dark meat cuts are light to moderate with thighs and thigh meat in the better balance. Part prices are steady to firm on boneless skinless breasts, legs, leg meat, and thigh meat and mostly steady on the balance of parts. Market activity for parts is slow to moderate. In production areas, live supplies are moderate. Weights are in a full range, mostly moderate. SOURCE: USDA LIVESTOCK, POULTRY & GRAIN MARKET NEWS DIVISION ��Atlanta, GA��� 404.562.5850 email: Atlanta.lpgmn@ams.usda.gov http://www.ams.usda.gov/market-news/livestock-poultry-grain Prepared: 11-Aug-16 1:53 PM E TSB/AAT
